name: DELVE (itch) (LeonAdrian17)
description:
Delve deeper into the dungeon, vanquish the evil and collect the keys!

This game is the result of a first-time programming and scripting semester during my game design studies. It has been made in pico8, which is a fantastic fantasy console  that allows you to make your own retro themed, arcade-like games from absolute scratch using lua. Make sure to check it out! Lots of kudos to my dean and lexaloffle for making pico8.

Can you find the secret character?(!)

PICO-8 by lexaloffle (itch.io)

CONTROLS:

O: C | X: X | Arrowkeys
